data.title: Claritas LLC
data.meta_description: Claritas is a data-driven marketing company. We leverage our unique data and proprietary identity graph, to help marketers find their best prospects, improve marketing execution and deliver superior ROI.
data.text:
Pinpointing potential customers more precisely. Engaging with them one-on-one more effectively. Turning them into loyal, paying customers more efficiently. That's the Claritas Advantage.

By continually investing in new technological capabilities, we’ve transformed our business to ensure our clients get ahead and stay ahead in this ever-evolving digital era.

Our unrivalled audience solutions let our clients know more about who each customer or prospect is, what they do, and what they believe in. Using 80% proprietary data, we offer the most robust understanding of the American consumer.

Powered by over 5 billion data points monthly, the transformative technology in the Claritas Identity Graph creates the highest-def portrait of current customers and new prospects including the devices and channels.

Using this in-depth intel, we help our clients create multichannel channel campaigns that reach

customers and prospects more personally, more seamlessly and more productively than ever before.

Our powerful analytic solutions and advanced segmentation and modeling capabilities provide clients with deep insight into multichannel campaign performance, attribution, and ways to further improve their marketing efforts.

A Passion for Data

Our data scientists have spent decades gathering data, analyzing data, and making data useful for marketers to use. Our researchers know the questions that need asking and ask them. Our sales professionals know what works, and perhaps more importantly, what doesn’t. to help our clients make the most effective use of all our tools. Combine this passion for data with the precision of our data, and we help all our clients achieve the results they’re looking for.

A Legacy of Success

For over 50 years, Claritas has been the leader in data-driven marketing. We have set the standard for the entire industry by offering over 2,500 syndicated audiences built from over 10,000 demographic and behavioral attributes. Our unique combination of experience, and the continual evolution of our technological capabilities have made us a trusted partner to over 1,200 companies. Many of these clients have been working with Claritas for over 20 years.
